root.name: Streetwars: Constructor Underworld
root.description: Original box art Streetwars continued on the construction tycoon-theme of its predecessor Constructor, but focused more on mission-based gameplay, where the player would have to solve various problems plaguing the players tenants. These problems ranged from getting beaten up by the opposing contractors mafia-like mobs to having their fences attacked by chainsaw-wielding maniacs with bags over their heads.
